name: 7 Minutes Till The End of The World
name_original: 7 Minutes Till The End of The World
description:
7 minutes, that's all the time you have to compete this game.

A Coursera Assignment gone mental.

Most assets provided by Michigan State University however the game is designed and modified by Jebara Al Falahi.

Major Modifications include:

1-Core gameplay hook of having a limited 7 minutes to complete, players can retry levels but even when they do the timer does not restart, beat this game in 7 minutes or get sent back to the main menu.

2-The flipping platform obstacle in which is made the core of level 2.

3-Rising Lava, of which level 3 revolves around.  

4- 3 unique levels, each with different elements:

  • Level 1 is a typical platformer with a variety of enemies and platforms.
  • Level 2 has flipping platforms that require careful consideration, the latter half   would punish with instant death 
  • Level 3 has rising lava that forces the player to act fast, as well as rely on moving platforms to force the player to do a lot of quick thinking.

5-Created brand new original music for the 3 levels.
